description: Situated in a charming rural setting at the foot of the surrounding hills, this trattoria has been run by the same family (now on the third generation) since 1939. Regional cuisine is to the fore here, with cured hams and roast and boiled meats all featuring on the menu, as well as its highly recommended homemade pastas and the almond tart withzabaione.
